[General]
loglevel = warning
show-error-page-for-reject = true
test-timeout = 5

# æµ‹è¯• URL

disable-geoip-db-auto-update = false
exclude-simple-hostnames = true

# DNS

encrypted-dns-follow-outbound-mode = false
encrypted-dns-server = https://doh.pub/dns-query, https://1.1.1.1/dns-query
read-etc-hosts = true

# æ§åˆ¶å™¨

always-real-ip = *.srv.nintendo.net, *.stun.playstation.net, xbox.*.microsoft.com, *.xboxlive.com, *.battlenet.com.cn, *.battlenet.com, *.blzstatic.cn, *.battle.net

udp-priority = false
